content: Thanks, Rav Ahuja! That is indeed a noteworthy option that eluded my search/several common websites with online course info. I’ve included it in the competition section under courses that have no rating/review data until I get a chance to test it out. The curriculum and presentation look great — I have a feeling it could challenge for a top three spot in this guide… UPDATE: I tested it out in-depth and found it very impressive in terms of breadth, depth, and production value. I’ve now positioned it above the competition section.
